content.html: They also lashed out at people with legitimate concerns, calling them mansplainers, racists, and hypocrites. They even compared the current death penalty for LGBTQ+ folks in Dubai to the 'recent' suicide of Alan Turing 68 years ago. Now they're playing victim.
content.value:
They also lashed out at people with legitimate concerns, calling them mansplainers, racists, and hypocrites. They even compared the current death penalty for LGBTQ+ folks in Dubai to the 'recent' suicide of Alan Turing 68 years ago.

Now they're playing victim.
